channel.title: Basic VB Slots
channel.description:
Here I hold in my hand.... a very, very basic Slots game made in VB.NET 2005 Express... I had another I had made some time ago, but it's lost on the server at my school.. never to be returned. I have the code, though, and COULD type it up, but don't have the patience.
Anyways, here is my Slots App.
[url=http://www.uppit.com/N9QZ]http://www.uppit.com/N9QZ[/url]
Tell me whatchya think.

Just put it up there… and checked it. Works for me…[br][size=1]Posted at: August 30, 2006, 07:30:30 AM[/size][hr]Anyone test this out yet?
